SEARCH
Package com.mathyan.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.mathyan.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditPersonWindowClosedListener
public class Controller extends Object implements EditPersonWindowClosedListener
This class represents the controller for the MVC pattern.

The controller is responsible for handling events from the view and updating the model.
